channel.title: Quests
channel.description:
Hey,
I've been thinking of an original way to have a server. As most are taken and have loyal players (PKing servers mainly), I've thought of another one, Quests!
I'm going to have my server be a Fully Fledged Quest server, with most, if not all, up to date quests and mini-games.
Now, my question is, does anyone know where the info for quests are? Also, does anyone also have the correct way to input quest related data and dialogue? I swear that I saw a tutorial on Kaitneiks, but as that's gone...well..you know.
Thank you for any help.

item.title: Quests
item.dc:creator: @firefox firefox
item.description:
@firefox wrote:

The info for all the quests can be found at http://www.runehq.com/RHQQuests.php

Read full topic

item.title: Quests
item.dc:creator: @zoss0 Zoss
item.description:
@zoss0 wrote:

Well, this may not help as much to you if your not a advanced coder but if you get the testscape sorce and have a look at it’s “Invisable armor” Quest you may be able to make your own…
Hope this helps ;D

Read full topic
